name: Bob Aufuldish
biography:
Education: BFA, MFA from Kent State University, Ohio.
Bob Aufuldish is a partner in Aufuldish & Warinner and an Affliate Associate Professor at California College of Arts and Crafts.  He teaches graphic design, typography, new media, and is Design Director for Sputnik CCAC.  Clients include Chronicle Books.
He has been in many exhibitions including "Magnets of Meaning" at San Francisco Museum of Modern Art and "Can U Dig it?" at Postmasters Gallery, New York City.  
Fontboy was also established in 1995 to manufacture and distribute his fonts.
